DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pharmacokinetics bioequivalence atazanavir fixed-dose combination cobicistat atazanavir coadministered cobicistat single agent .
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Individual Atazanavir Cobicistat Compared With Atazanavir Fixed-dose Combination With Cobicistat
